title: Birthday Discount
description: Celebrate your birthday with a 20% discount on any drink or dessert during your birthday week.

title: Seasonal Specials
description: Try our seasonal favorites like Pumpkin Spice Latte and Gingerbread Cupcake – only this season!

title: Morning Coffee Combo
description: Enjoy a coffee and a cupcake of your choice for just $5.99 – every morning until 11 AM.

title: Happy Hour
description: 20% off all drinks between 3 PM and 5 PM daily. Come chill with us!

title: Eco Cup Discount
description: Bring your own cup and get $0.50 off your drink – let's help the planet together!

title: Bring a Friend
description: Bring a friend and you both get 15% off your orders. Sharing is caring!

title: Weekend Treat
description: Get every second cupcake at half price during weekends!

title: Student Discount
description: 10% off for students – just show your student ID at checkout.
